widget.description: Generates a titles list of the most recently submitted links, with links to their detail pages, for the vertical areas of the template.

setting.name: TITLE
setting.info: This title shows at top of the widget's generated content.

setting.name: NUMBER OF LINKS
setting.info: Fill in how many of the latest links should be listed.

setting.name: CACHE RESULTS
setting.info: "Yes" if you want the results to be cached, "No" if not.

widget.author: PhpLD
